readable.title: 3307147971_5b3abf61f9
readable.content: A man and a woman ride scooter like vehicles a man and woman are riding scooters through a field of grass and clover . Two adults - a male and a female - are standing on scooters in a field of yellow flowers . Two people on scooters in a field of flowers . Two people wearing helmets ride over the yellow and white flowers .
